author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: Gossip | Watch: Jennifer Lawrence stuffing as many marshmallows in her mouth as possible just because
text:
Hurrah! The crazy train that is JLaw on an international press tour is back, thus guaranteeing at least a month or two of solid Jennifer Lawrence being ridiculous and awesome in equal measure moments. Don't pretend you don't love it.
Lawrence and her Hunger Games co-stars Josh Hutcherson and Liam Hemsworth sat down with MTV's Josh Horowitz in 'Camp Mockingjay' to talk 'The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2' to do stupid things unrelated to the film because that's how promo tours work in the 21st century and you're part of a teen franchise.
After burning their hosts attempt a ghost story, the trio then play a game of 'Truth or Dare', which starts with a truth about disgusting habits (JLaw doesn't wash her hands after the bathroom apparently) and then moves onto a dare to see how marshmallows Lawrence can fit in her mouth.
Never one to back down from a challenge, JLaw goes all in.
Come for the mouth-stuffing, stay for the gross date story that the marshmallow stuffing reminds Lawrence of.
Via MTV
